why: Understanding neurotags helps you recognize how your brain creates pain patterns and how to change them.

slides.title: Neurotags 101
slides.content: Neurotags are networks in your brain that can create pain even when tissues are healing

slides.title: Brain Networks
slides.content: Your brain has millions of connections that can amplify or reduce pain signals based on context and experience

slides.title: Changing Patterns
slides.content: Through movement, education, and positive experiences, you can rewire these networks to reduce pain sensitivity

slides.title: Clinical Applications
slides.content: Neurotag training is used in chronic pain management, phantom limb pain, and complex regional pain syndrome

slides.title: Myth vs Fact
slides.content: Myth: Only hard exercise helps pain. Fact: Imagery and mapping can reduce pain too.
